title: Future // Past
description: Joshua and Ben take a look back at the past year and discuss the highs and lows of episodes on the podcast, creative trends, creative tools, NFTs, and anything else we could remember. We also talk about what we expect to see happen in 2022. We'll be honest, I think we're conditioned from experiencing 2020/2021 to expect the worse so that we can be pleasantly surprised if the year goes well :)
dc:creator: How You Create
